database.name: VIEW SWA_PICKINGLIST_LINES_V
database.view: SELECT COALESCE(a.identifier_id, '-') || COALESCE(a.m_product_id, '-') AS swa_pickinglist_lines_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.created, a.createdby, a.line, a.m_product_id, a.movementqty, a.c_uom_id, a.m_locator_id, a.m_inout_id, a.m_production_id, a.em_obwpl_pickinglist_id AS em_swa_pickinglist_id, a.qtyboxline, a.qtybox_balanceperline, a.m_productionplan_id, a.em_swa_status_picking_line, a.m_inoutline_id, a.m_productionline_id FROM (SELECT m_inoutline.m_inoutline_id AS identifier_id, m_inoutline.line, m_inoutline.ad_org_id, m_inoutline.ad_client_id, m_inoutline.isactive, m_inoutline.updated, m_inoutline.updatedby, m_inoutline.created, m_inoutline.createdby, m_inoutline.m_product_id, CASE WHEN m_inoutline.movementqty < 0 THEN m_inoutline.movementqty * (-1) ELSE m_inoutline.movementqty END AS movementqty, m_inoutline.c_uom_id, m_inoutline.m_locator_id, m_inoutline.m_inout_id, '' AS m_production_id, m_inoutline.em_obwpl_pickinglist_id, m_inoutline.em_swa_numcajasint_perline AS qtyboxline, m_inoutline.em_swa_cajasextras_perline AS qtybox_balanceperline, '' AS m_productionplan_id, m_inoutline.em_swa_status_picking_line, m_inoutline.m_inoutline_id, '' AS m_productionline_id FROM m_inoutline WHERE m_inoutline.em_obwpl_pickinglist_id IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT pl.m_productionline_id AS identifier_id, pl.line, p.ad_org_id, p.ad_client_id, pl.isactive, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.created, p.createdby, pl.m_product_id, CASE WHEN pl.movementqty < 0 THEN pl.movementqty * (-1) ELSE pl.movementqty END AS movementqty, pl.c_uom_id, pl.em_swa_m_locator_tmp_id AS m_locator_id, '' AS m_inout_id, p.m_production_id, pl.em_swa_pickinglist_id, pl.em_swa_qtybox_perline AS qtyboxline, pl.em_swa_qtybox_perline_saldo AS qtybox_balanceperline, pl.m_productionplan_id, pl.em_swa_status_picking_line, '' AS m_inoutline_id, pl.m_productionline_id FROM m_productionline pl JOIN m_productionplan pp ON pp.m_productionplan_id = pl.m_productionplan_id JOIN m_production p ON p.m_production_id = pp.m_production_id WHERE pl.em_swa_pickinglist_id IS NOT NULL) a
